title: 15: Apple Watch and fitness, with Liz Plosser
description: Apple's messaging around Watch Series 2 was fitness-focused, but how does it hold up, and is there really a market for it? Caldwell, Ritchie, and special guest Liz Plosser from Self Magazine discuss!
itunes:author: Serenity Caldwell, Rene Ritchie, Liz Plosser
itunes:subtitle: Apple's messaging around Watch Series 2 was fitness-focused, but how does it hold up, and is there really a market for it? Caldwell, Ritchie, and special guest Liz Plosser from Self Magazine discuss!
itunes:summary: Apple's messaging around Watch Series 2 was fitness-focused, but how does it hold up, and is there really a market for it? Caldwell, Ritchie, and special guest Liz Plosser from Self Magazine discuss!
